Eight RedHawks Recognized as Academic All-MAC
Eight student-athletes from Miami University have been honored as Academic All-MAC for women's soccer, recognizing their excellence in both academics and athletics. To qualify, students must maintain a minimum 3.20 GPA and participate in at least half of their team's contests.
